info.title: DDBJ Search API
info.description: RESTful API for searching and retrieving BioProject, BioSample, SRA, and JGA entries from DDBJ.

get.description:
Search entries across all database types.

Supports keyword search, organism/date filtering, pagination,
sorting, field selection, and facet aggregation.  Use the ``types``
parameter to narrow the search to specific database types.

parameters.name: keywordFields

schema.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.
schema.title: Keywordfields

parameters.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.

parameters.name: keywordOperator

schema.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

parameters.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: Sort order as '{field}:{direction}'. Fields: datePublished, dateModified. Direction: asc, desc. Default: relevance (search score).
schema.title: Sort

parameters.description: Sort order as '{field}:{direction}'. Fields: datePublished, dateModified. Direction: asc, desc. Default: relevance (search score).

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Limit response to specific top-level fields (comma-separated). Example: 'identifier,organism,datePublished'.
schema.title: Fields

parameters.description: Limit response to specific top-level fields (comma-separated). Example: 'identifier,organism,datePublished'.

parameters.name: includeProperties

schema.description: Include the 'properties' field in the response.
schema.title: Includeproperties

parameters.description: Include the 'properties' field in the response.

parameters.name: includeFacets

schema.description: Include facet aggregation alongside search results.
schema.title: Includefacets

parameters.description: Include facet aggregation alongside search results.

parameters.name: dbXrefsLimit

schema.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.
schema.title: Dbxrefslimit

parameters.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g. deep paging limit exceeded).

get.description:
Search bioproject entries.

Supports BioProject-specific filters: organization, publication, grant, umbrella.

parameters.name: keywordFields

schema.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.
schema.title: Keywordfields

parameters.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.

parameters.name: keywordOperator

schema.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

parameters.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: Sort order as '{field}:{direction}'. Fields: datePublished, dateModified. Direction: asc, desc. Default: relevance (search score).
schema.title: Sort

parameters.description: Sort order as '{field}:{direction}'. Fields: datePublished, dateModified. Direction: asc, desc. Default: relevance (search score).

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Limit response to specific top-level fields (comma-separated). Example: 'identifier,organism,datePublished'.
schema.title: Fields

parameters.description: Limit response to specific top-level fields (comma-separated). Example: 'identifier,organism,datePublished'.

parameters.name: includeProperties

schema.description: Include the 'properties' field in the response.
schema.title: Includeproperties

parameters.description: Include the 'properties' field in the response.

parameters.name: includeFacets

schema.description: Include facet aggregation alongside search results.
schema.title: Includefacets

parameters.description: Include facet aggregation alongside search results.

parameters.name: umbrella

schema.description: Filter by umbrella status: TRUE or FALSE (case-insensitive).
schema.title: Umbrella

parameters.description: Filter by umbrella status: TRUE or FALSE (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: dbXrefsLimit

schema.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.
schema.title: Dbxrefslimit

parameters.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g. deep paging limit exceeded).

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

post.description:
Retrieve multiple entries by their IDs.  Up to 1000 IDs can be specified per request.

**format=json** (default): returns ``{entries: [...], notFound: [...]}``.

**format=ndjson**: returns one entry per line in NDJSON format (Content-Type: application/x-ndjson).  IDs not found are not included in the NDJSON output.

parameters.name: format

schema.description: Response format: 'json' (JSON Array) or 'ndjson' (Newline Delimited JSON).

parameters.description: Response format: 'json' (JSON Array) or 'ndjson' (Newline Delimited JSON).

schema.description: One JSON object per line (NDJSON). Each line is an entry document.

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

get.description:
Retrieve the raw Elasticsearch document for an entry.  All fields including the full ``dbXrefs`` are returned as-is.

The response type varies by database type: BioProject, BioSample, SRA, or JGA.

schema.title: Response Get Entry Json Entries  Type   Id  Json Get

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

get.description:
Retrieve an entry in JSON-LD format with ``@context`` and ``@id`` fields added for RDF compatibility.

Content-Type: application/ld+json.

schema.title: Response Get Entry Jsonld Entries  Type   Id  Jsonld Get

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

get.description: Retrieve all cross-references for an entry in one response.

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

get.description:
Retrieve a single entry with dbXrefs truncated by ``dbXrefsLimit`` and ``dbXrefsCount`` added.  Use this endpoint for frontend display.  For the raw ES document, use the ``.json`` variant.

The response type varies by database type: BioProjectDetailResponse, BioSampleDetailResponse, SraDetailResponse, or JgaDetailResponse.

parameters.name: dbXrefsLimit

schema.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.
schema.title: Dbxrefslimit

parameters.description: Maximum number of dbXrefs to return (0-1000). Use 0 to omit dbXrefs but still get dbXrefsCount.

schema.title: Response Get Entry Detail Entries  Type   Id  Get

404.description: Not Found (entry does not exist or invalid type).

get.description:
Get facet counts across all database types.

Returns aggregated counts for organism, status, accessibility, and
type.  Search filter parameters narrow the set of entries that
facets are computed over.

parameters.name: keywordFields

schema.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.
schema.title: Keywordfields

parameters.description: Limit keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated). Allowed: identifier, title, name, description.

parameters.name: keywordOperator

schema.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

parameters.description: Boolean operator for keywords: AND or OR.

get.description:
Get facet counts for bioproject entries.

Includes the bioproject-specific ``objectType`` facet and supports additional BioProject filter parameters.

BioProjectDetailResponse.title: BioProjectDetailResponse
BioProjectDetailResponse.description: BioProject entry detail with truncated dbXrefs and dbXrefsCount.

BioSampleDetailResponse.title: BioSampleDetailResponse
BioSampleDetailResponse.description: BioSample entry detail with truncated dbXrefs and dbXrefsCount.

BulkFormat.title: BulkFormat
BulkFormat.description: Output format for the Bulk API.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: List of entry identifiers to retrieve (max 1000).

BulkResponse.title: BulkResponse
BulkResponse.description:
Response for POST /entries/{type}/bulk (format=json).

``entries`` contains the found entries as raw ES documents.
``notFound`` lists IDs that could not be found.

DbType.title: DbType
DbType.description: Database types supported by the API (12 types).

EntryListItem.title: EntryListItem
EntryListItem.description:
Summary representation of an entry in search result lists.

The actual fields vary by database type.  Common fields shared by all
types are declared here; type-specific fields are captured by
``extra="allow"``.

EntryListResponse.title: EntryListResponse
EntryListResponse.description: Search result list with pagination and optional facets.

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of entries matching this value.

FacetBucket.title: FacetBucket
FacetBucket.description: A single bucket in a facet aggregation.

type.title: Type
type.description: Entry count per database type (cross-type search only).

Facets.title: Facets
Facets.description:
Facet aggregation results.

Common facets (organism, status, accessibility) are always present.
``type`` is included only for cross-type searches.
``objectType`` is included only for bioproject-type searches.

JgaDetailResponse.title: JgaDetailResponse
JgaDetailResponse.description: JGA entry detail with truncated dbXrefs and dbXrefsCount.

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: Request path where the error occurred.

requestId.title: Requestid
requestId.description: Request tracking ID (same as X-Request-ID header).

SraDetailResponse.title: SraDetailResponse
SraDetailResponse.description: SRA entry detail with truncated dbXrefs and dbXrefsCount.
